'''Anthony Jackson''' ([[18 February|February 18]], [[1944]] – [[27 November|November 27]], [[2006]]) was the voice of "the Tale Bearer" (the narrator) in ''[[The Hobbit (1968 radio series)|The Hobbit]]'' radio adaptation broadcast on BBC Radio 4.
